metadata.title: CVE-2019-9923 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
pax_decode_header in sparse.c in GNU Tar before 1.32 had a NULL pointerdereference when parsing certain archives that have malformed extendedheaders.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tar - 1.34+dfsg-1build3
tar-scripts - 1.34+dfsg-1build3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tar package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.34+dfsg-1build3').
